data.message: Fucking Beyoncé. Are you  out of rappers to work with? I really hoped this new album would not have bitches like Rihanna on them and you would go back to what hip hop to me should sound like. No fucking piano or pop/r&b Singers singing about walking on water and some shit about Jesus. I'm atarting to fear the worst about whats to come...

replies.message: Fear the worst??? Thats fucked up. Why you fear it? Cuz your ass is about to fry? Better fear it!! Stfu PUNK! Gtfo

Hahaha are you bloody serious? I just don't think he'll ever return like I once knew him. And I am and will allways be a fan of what I think is slim shady. If you don't understand then you can go fuck yourself. Come with something better than that comment stupid bitch. Fucking bring it.
